title: Gov. Newsom posthumously pardons abortion provider convicted in 1949
dc:creator: Noah Goldberg
description: Laura Miner was convicted of providing abortion services in 1949. Gov. Gavin Newsom posthumously pardoned her Friday.
content:encoded: Laura Miner was convicted of providing abortion services in 1949. Gov. Gavin Newsom posthumously pardoned her Friday.
